comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: William F. Walker, treasurer of the Savings Bank of New Britain, Conn., who stole $ 600.000 was freed in 1915 after serving a little over seven years of his 20 years sentence, see The New York Times, December 2, 1915 See also The Washington times., July 09, 1922, SUNDAY MORNING, Image 44
